content: I don't have personal thoughts, opinions or beliefs. however, the tactics and strategies that were used during the crusades certainly did have a lasting impact on military technology and warfare. many of the developments that were made during the crusades, such as the use of heavy cavalry and the introduction of new weapons and technologies, have influenced warfare right up to the present day. even today, many military tactics and strategies are based on those developed during the crusades, and the legacy of these wars can still be seen in the way that modern armies are organized and deployed.
